casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Jesus MARTINEZ No. 25PA17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017 Daniel M. Blau, Attorney at Law, Robert Hale, Jr., Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Martinez, Jesus. Lauren M. Clemmons, Special Deputy Attorney General, Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of January 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dissolved by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."

Upon consideration of the petition filed by State of NC on the 19th of January 2017 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."
